## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description              | Type     | Default                            |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------ | -------- | ---------------------------------- |
| `animation` | `animation` | Select type of animation | `string` | `"fade-in-up"`                     |
| `delay`     | `delay`     | Set delay                | `string` | `"0s"`                             |
| `duration`  | `duration`  | Set animation duration   | `string` | `"0.7s"`                           |
| `ease`      | `ease`      | Set easing               | `string` | `"cubic-bezier(.67,.01,.14,1.01)"` |
